name: Telluria: Forebodings Gear Minigame
description:
Telluria: Forebodings Gear Minigame is a short puzzle game involving logical challenges. The player is expected to solve riddles with textual or visual hints and put clues together in a logical way, in order to arrive at the correct solution in various levels of difficulty.



Annelise, the main character in the upcoming Telluria: Forebodings, is needing your help to open the bulkheads of the watermill (1st Age) / library (3rd Age), thus advancing in her quest for the Pyrite Talisman. Solve the puzzles and turn the gears in the correct order to win.



Get involved in her destiny and support the main game. Your journey on Telluria starts here.
